span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 vt. 撤空： to empty or remove the contents of
【例】 They were ordered to evacuate the building 被命令搬出大楼
【近】 clear, vacate, void
【反】 fill up, occupy, load 填满
【考法 2】 vt. 撤退： to remove especially from a military zone or dangerous area
【例】 During World War II, children were evacuated from London to the country. 二战期间，伦敦市的儿童被撤离到郊区。
【反】 conquer 占领
【记】 e 出 + vacu- 空→向外走，都空了
【另】 vacuum 真空的，真空吸尘器, vacate 腾出，撤出
